item.title: San Francisco Museum of Modern Art
item.description: Custom integrations for bidirectional communication between legacy inventory and warehouse management were developed for Magento 1.9.x. A custom authentication provider was implemented to tie into a niche membership management system, providing a seamless in-person and online experience for customers.
